import React from 'react' import BlueBg from '../Assets/blueBg.jpeg' import GreenBg from '../Assets/greenBg.jpeg' import Logo from '../Assets/tweed-logo-white.svg' import BlueProd from '../Assets/Indica.png' import GreenProd from '../Assets/Sativa.png' import {useHistory} from 'react-router-dom' import './Pages.css' /** * @author * @function ChooseOption **/ const ChooseOption = (props) => { const history = useHistory() const viewInfo = () =>{ history.push('/tweed-info') } return(

AFGHAN KUSH

21% THC

GREEN CUSH

21% THC

) } export default ChooseOption
